name: kernel-test-suite-module
description: skynet kernel module to test the kernel's APIs

scripts.deps: npm install libkmodule@latest && npm install libskynetnode@latest
scripts.lint: npm run deps && npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.compile-1: npm run lint && tsc && npm run rollup
scripts.compile-2: npm run compile-1 && npm run build-script
scripts.compile: npm run compile-2 && mv dist-build/build.js dist-build/build.mjs

author: David Vorick
